buffer.description: Sets the buffer progress bar's value. Value should be between [0, 1]. Setting this value to be less than 1 will reveal moving, buffering dots.

progress.description: Sets the primary progress bar's value. Value should be between [0, 1].

indeterminate.description: Sets the linear-progress into its indeterminate state.

reverse.description: Reverses the direction of the linear progress indicator.

closed.description: Sets the progress indicator to the closed state. Sets content opactiy to 0. Typically should be set to true when loading has finished.
